channel.title: JazzPracticePro Blog
channel.description: Expert tips, practice methods, and insights to help you understand your jazz practice.

item.title: The Only Way to Get Good: What Charlie Parker and Freddie Hubbard Learned the Hard Way
item.description: Before Charlie Parker was Bird, he got laughed off stage. Learn what Parker and Freddie Hubbard discovered about fundamentals and practice.
item.author: contact@jazzpracticepro.com (Jazz Practice Pro Team)
